reviewText: It was like reviewing a class I took in 1989.  It brought back all the thing I missed during the class because I was into a meditative state during the weekend in 1989.  It helped me to review what I had done as the information I did not hear then. I have gone to other classes the used the video instructions, but it did not do it justice because I was unable to watch uninterrupted by others questions.  but having my own video was very helpful.
